issue.title: [Python] Expose Status::ExecutionError in the Python API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11554](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11554). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It will be good to have the arrow::Status::ExecutionError to be exposed to the Python API.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11554?focusedCommentId=17281012) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I suppose this is Gandiva-related?

In any case, don't hesitate to submit a PR. You'll find some guidance here: <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/#toc-development>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11554?focusedCommentId=17349042) by Jayjeet Chakraborty (Jayjeet):*
This is no longer need by us. Closing it.
